Posts.Content: I have been diagnosed with prostrate cancer and seriously considering hifu procedure, I live in SC, would like to hear or converse with ones near or in S C that have had procedure. Also if you had ablatherm or sonablate and experience from either? Sweazy is doctor in Columbia that does hifu, he does sonablate
Posts.Title: Prostate cancer HIFU

Posts.Content: Thanks, I did talk personally to a patient similar to me that had this treatment, hifu, he said it was as promised, psa back to 0.0 and he has not issues. Would still like to hear from more.
